She is very interesting and entertaining. You can tell she loves teaching and is very very knowledgable. She is an extremely fair teacher and is quite funny! Tells you exactly what to expect on the tests and in class. Attendence is required and DON'T be late! I DEFINITELY recommend Dr. Scott!!
Dr. Scott is an extremely intelligent professor and her class is very interesting. Though attendance was mandatory, i did look forward to going to her class everyday.

Terrible, I am so glad I am finished with this class. Her methods and the way she speaks to her students is completely unacceptable to me. Save yourself alot of stress and take someone else if you can.

Dr. Scott is one of the best teachers I have ever had. I didn't even read the issues and I made an A on the midterm and a B on the final. Pay attention, study the powerpoints, attend class, and you'll be fine. It's a 2 hour credit so it ends one month before your other classes, which is nice. Dr. Scott is very helpful, she really knows her stuff!

Gives a great lecture and she can be VERY rude. Pay attention to her instructions--or she will humiliate you for asking. Tests are tough--so read the Issues and study the PowerPoints. One class PowerPoint presentation and one paper. She will eat you alive for plagiarism--be careful how you write paper. Class not hard if you study.

Dr.Scott is an awesome professor!She is well educated in her filled and she might be hard,but she is funny and engaging!She's my favorite teacher...just make sure you aren't late and listen and study b/c the test are hard,but what you learn you see in other classes and I find myself using some of the material we've studied to analyze situations.
No Comments

Hard tests. STUDY and Print ALL power point slides. HAtes it when ppl are late and embarasses them so its better to just not show up if youre going to be late. Intimidating woman but great teacher knows a lot about psychology and is a current psychologist
Fun teacher, one of the best ive had at KSU

Dr Scott is one of the best professors I have ever had! She is extremely smart and knows what she's talking about. You have to go to class and if you are late she will stop talking and stare at you until you sit down. But if you never miss class and are never late you get 10 points at the end of the semester. Tests are easy if you study.

Dr. Scott is a wonderful and extremely intelligent professor. She knows the material very well, and she is just an amazing insight into the world of psychology. She is very helpful to students who want to do well in her class, and you can tell she cares about each person. Follow directions and study will give you an excellent grade.

Take this class! Class is as interesting as Scott. She's very helpful practically spells everything out for you. Read the articles and go to class and you won't even have to study - I barely did - all common sense "make sense"? She tells you what to know for the test. Group project but better than you would think! Take this class!

One of the best professors I've had. Incredible knowledgeable about everything. She answers all questions in great detail. Make sure you go to class and pay attention and you'll be fine. I HIGHLY recommend her!!

professor scott knows all about psychology and i liked her personal stories. she puts powerpoints of notes online and goes over them in class. some lessons she has groups present. the tests are challenging so STUDY. the big paper/project we had was nit-picky but is a good way to boost your grade. get on her good side and youll be fine.

I loved this professor! She was clear in expectations and in notes.  She made the class interesting.  You can make an A in this class, but you must read the book and study!!  She gives studyguides, but suggests you do notecards from the beginning...it helped!  I would definately recommend her and I wish she taught other psych classes!  Best ever!!!

I went into the final with an 80, made a B on the final and ended up with an A in the class! I'll take it! She is fun to listen to, definately knows what she's talking about. As long as you write down what she tells you to study, you will do good on the test. Easy class - four tests, a few assignments, and a few quizzes. I'd take her again
Very intelligent and congenial. Class is actually challenging even if you show up to every lecture. Tests require studying of all major topics and reading.
